name: oh no what a pizzaster
description:
Made during Code Coven IGM 🌙 Spring 2021 Week 04

✨Notes:

  • Inspired by eating pizza at 8PM because cooking is hard and my roommate Ben's hatred of olives
  • Move character with arrow keys (or A and D)
  • Credits
    • Start screen music: Starling by Podington Bear
    • Gameplay music: Summer Mvt 3 Presto by John Harrison with the Wichita State University Chamber Players
    • End screen music: Something Elated by Broke For Free
    • Font: Dogica
